content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) with coal (50) and iron ore (1) in its inventory, currently producing iron plates.
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) with coal (47) in its inventory, currently has no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, 0.0) with coal (50) in its inventory, currently has no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position 6.0, 0.0) with coal (3) in its inventory, currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Wooden Chest at position (8.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entity:
- Wooden chest (position 8.5, 0.5) with an empty inventory.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace inventory is full (50/50 items).

### Errors when attempting to insert items without having them
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace. The error indicates that there was no iron ore to insert.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### General inventory management
- Monitor your inventory levels to avoid running out of essential materials like coal and iron ore, which can halt production processes.
